quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
author: William Feather

quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Great works are performed, not by strength, but by perseverance.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
author: Unknown

quote: A river cuts through rock, not because of its power but its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: We will either find a way or make one.
author: Hannibal

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this-you haven’t.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Keep your head up. God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
author: Unknown

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: The will to succeed is important, but what’s more important is the will to prepare.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Be not afraid of going slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.
author: George M. Moore Jr.

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: When the world says, 'Give up,' Hope whispers, 'Try it one more time.'
author: Unknown

quote: Grit is that 'extra something' that separates the most successful people from the rest.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road… unless you fail to make the turn.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Perseverance is stubbornness with a purpose.
author: Josh Shipp

quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
author: Chris Bradford

quote: Perseverance is the key to success.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Perseverance furthers.
author: I Ching

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after another.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: The drops of rain make a hole in the stone, not by violence, but by oft falling.
author: Lucretius

quote: He conquers who endures.
author: Persius

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Through perseverance, many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Success is not for the chosen few, but for the few who choose it.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages.
author: George Washington

quote: The greatest oak was once a little nut who held its ground.
author: Unknown

quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Perseverance is the act of true role models and heroes.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Perseverance is the mother of success.
author: Arab Proverb

quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Perseverance is not a passive submission to circumstances-it is a strong and active response to the difficult events of life.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Perseverance is the foundation of all actions.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Perseverance is the secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Perseverance is the courage to ignore the obvious wisdom of turning back.
author: Unknown

quote: Perseverance is the ability to ignore the obvious wisdom of turning back.
author: Unknown

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de La Bruyère

quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: What doesn’t kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens.
author: Helen Keller

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Adversity introduces a man to himself.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
author: Molière

quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
author: African Proverb

quote: Difficulties mastered are opportunities won.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
author: Kenji Miyazawa

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Adversity is the first path to truth.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.
author: Bob Riley

quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it’s always best to keep busy.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
author: James A. Michener

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: The darkest hour has only sixty minutes.
author: Morris Mandel

quote: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work through difficult problems.
author: Gever Tulley

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: In adversity, remember to keep an even mind.
author: Horace

quote: Adversity shows whether we have friends, or only the shadows of friends.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: The soul would have no rainbow if the eyes had no tears.
author: Native American Proverb

quote: Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today.
author: Unknown

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: There is no education like adversity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Failure is the mother of success.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness.
author: Susan Gale

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Sea captains don’t cry out when waves batter their ships.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Your perspective, not your problems, determines your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: On the other side of a storm is the strength that comes from having navigated through it.
author: Sam Storms

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Sorrow prepares you for joy.
author: Rumi

quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: Carl Bard

quote: When adversity strikes, that’s when you have to be the most calm.
author: Prince Harry

quote: We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Adversity is the diamond dust heaven polishes its jewels with.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Make your heart like a stone and your head like a rock.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
author: Mario Fernandez

quote: Adversity is like a strong wind. It tears away from us all but the things that cannot be torn.
author: Arthur Golden

quote: When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge.
author: Janet Fitch

quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down; it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl-but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: When we are tested, we discover which of us is wired for victory.
author: Rudy Giuliani

quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Rock bottom kept me focused, because it was the only place to go but up.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The race is not always to the swift nor the battle to the strong-but that’s the way to bet.
author: Damon Runyon

quote: You never fail until you stop trying.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass-it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene

quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again.
author: Buddha

quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The lion does not turn around when a small dog barks.
author: African Proverb

quote: Prosperity tries the fortunate; adversity the great.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: The only way to get through adversity is to maintain your faith that you will be ok.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Character is built by overcoming adversity.
author: Unknown

quote: When adversity strikes, it unveils our true resilience.
author: Unknown

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Hope is the only thing stronger than fear.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine-and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo-far more flexible than you’d ever believe at first glance.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: Adversity is a great teacher, but its lessons are painful.
author: Unknown

quote: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The phoenix, you see, is proof that disasters can also lead to beauty.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Adversity is the crucible in which we become who we are meant to be.
author: Unknown

quote: Your greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time you fall.
author: Confucius

quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Adversity reveals genius, prosperity conceals it.
author: Horace

quote: The strongest steel is forged by the fires of hell.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: It is your reaction to adversity, not adversity itself, that determines how your life’s story will develop.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

quote: No rock does not get its shape from the waves that batter it.
author: Unknown

quote: Adversity is the furnace that tempers the steel of the soul.
author: Unknown
